title._content: Image taken from page 64 of 'The Land of Rip Van Winkle. A tour through the romantic parts of the Catskills. Its legends and traditions ... With illustrations by J. Lauber, C. Volkmar, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Land of Rip Van Winkle. A tour through the romantic parts of the Catskills. Its legends and traditions ... With illustrations by J. Lauber, C. Volkmar, etc" Author: SEARING, A. E.P. Contributor: LAUBER, Joseph - Artist Contributor: VOLKMAR, Charles. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.f.12." Page: 64 Place of Publishing: New York & London Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: G. P. Putnam's Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003322696 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
